projects.name: Snap Map
projects.description: A web application that allows users to view and share locations, implemented through REST APIs using the MERN stack. It offers secure authentication and user-friendly interface. It features Loki, an AI assistant(LLM) that provides smart insights about places, enhancing the user experience.

projects.name: Order Up
projects.description: Order UP is a web application with config-driven UI developed using React.js, that displays restaurant data using the Swiggy API. It uses the user's live location to show nearby restaurants and includes a search bar with debouncing to help users find restaurants quickly without slowing down the app and to minimize the number of API calls and improve efficiency.
projects.notes: Requires CORS enabled in browser for optimal experience

projects.name: To-Do-App
projects.description: A comprehensive task management application that allows users to manage tasks by adding, marking as complete, and deleting them. Features an undo functionality for deleted tasks and uses advanced state management to provide seamless task organization in a clean, intuitive interface.

projects.name: Akshay MindMap
projects.description: An intuitive note-taking application offering comprehensive note management with features to add, edit, and delete notes. Ensures error-free input with real-time validation, highlights missing fields, and provides a popup editor for easy updates. Features responsive design with soft-toned UI and Material UI icons for enhanced user experience.

projects.name: Ping Pong
projects.description: A classic table tennis-inspired game where players control paddles on opposite sides of the screen to hit a ball back and forth. Features smooth paddle controls, realistic ball physics, and multiplayer functionality for an engaging gaming experience.

projects.name: Snake-Xenzia-Game
projects.description: A modern implementation of the classic Snake game where players control a snake to eat items and score points. As the snake eats, it grows longer, increasing the challenge. Features smooth controls, score tracking, and progressively increasing difficulty.

projects.name: Drum Kit
projects.description: An interactive virtual drum kit web application that allows users to explore and play a wide range of beats using keyboard or mouse controls. Features realistic drum sounds, visual feedback, and an intuitive interface for music creation and practice.

projects.name: Turtle-Crossing-Game
projects.description: An engaging arcade-style game where a turtle attempts to cross a busy road while avoiding oncoming cars. Features increasing difficulty levels, collision detection, and score tracking for an entertaining gaming experience.

projects.name: Password Generator
projects.description: A comprehensive password management application that securely stores passwords in the backend with capabilities to generate passwords automatically or allow user input. Features secure retrieval of passwords by application name and robust backend storage systems.

projects.name: DNOTES - Web3 Note-Taking Application
projects.description: A decentralized note-taking application built on the Internet Computer Blockchain, ensuring data persistence across renders. Allows users to add, edit, and delete notes with real-time validation, intuitive popup editors, and responsive design, enhanced by Material UI icons for seamless user experience on the blockchain.

projects.name: AK Bank
projects.description: A decentralized banking application built on the Internet Computer Blockchain that allows users to securely manage their funds with features to top up, withdraw, and earn compound interest on savings. Features real-time balance tracking and persistent data storage for seamless and transparent financial management.

projects.name: NAKR Token Application
projects.description: A decentralized token application on the Internet Computer Blockchain, enabling secure token transfers, balance queries, and initial token claims. Ensures seamless data persistence across upgrades, offering scalable and reliable token management with comprehensive blockchain integration.
